updates.title: 8 tips for designers building branded templates in Figma Buzz
updates.description: To create self-serve templates that bend—but don’t break—brand designers need to consider work through a marketing lens. Here’s how to set up editing guardrails and design layouts that flex and scale.

updates.title: Google’s vibe-coding tool Opal comes to Gemini
updates.description: The company on Wednesday said it is integrating the tool, which lets you build AI-powered mini apps, inside the Gemini web app, allowing users to create their own custom apps.

updates.title: OpenAI continues on its ‘code red’ warpath with new image generation model
updates.description: OpenAI rolls out GPT Image 1.5 for ChatGPT, promising 4x faster generation, better instruction-following, and precise edits. The launch  escalates its rivalry with Google Gemini.

updates.title: Hard problems are still hard: A story about the tools that change and the work that doesn't
updates.description: Figma designer–turned–product manager Nikolas Klein worked on building prototyping tools for seven years. Then AI changed the game.

updates.title: Introducing three new tools for precise image editing in Figma
updates.description: Today we’re introducing three new AI image editing tools that make precision editing faster, cleaner, and more intuitive—powering a more complete creative workflow in Figma.

updates.title: DoorDash rolls out Zesty, an AI social app for discovering new restaurants
updates.description: Users can view and share photos and comments about restaurants they’ve visited, discover content from others, and follow people just like on any social network.

updates.title: Just our type: The story of creating Figma Sans
updates.description: As Figma expands to include tools for all product builders, our community has evolved—and so has our brand. We’ve overhauled our entire visual identity from color palette to illustration style, and even commissioned a new typeface.
